newsitem.title: USA: CHX Sept share volume up 1.5 pct from year before.
newsitem.headline: CHX Sept share volume up 1.5 pct from year before.

text.p: The Chicago Stock Exchange (CHX) said on Wednesday that share volume in September rose to 296,517,522, up 1.5 percent from 292,062,218 shares traded in September 1995.

Year-to-date share volume in 1996 stood at 2,884,999,504, up 5.6 percent from the same nine-month period last year, when 2,733,029,223 shares changed hands, the CHX said. -- Derivatives Desk 312-408-8750E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
